Docs.summary: Represents a <serviceHealth> configuration element that defines a service health behavior.

Docs.summary: Creates a health service behavior based on the current configuration settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HealthDetailsEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HealthDetailsEnabled : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the service is allowed to display service details and information in the health page.
Docs.value: if the health endpoint should return the service details, or if the response should contain no content. Its default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The `HealthDetailsEnabled` property corresponds to the value of the `HealthDetailsEnabled` attribute of a `<serviceHealth>` element. If the attribute is not defined in a configuration file, its default value is `true`. It defines the value of the [ServiceHealthBehavior.HealthDetailsEnabled](xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceHealthBehaviorBase.HealthDetailsEnabled) property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HttpGetBinding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HttpGetBinding : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string that represents the type of binding used for health retrieval via an HTTP/Get request.
Docs.value: A string that represents the binding used for health retrieval via an HTTP/Get request.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The `HttpGetBinding` property corresponds to the value of the `HttpGetBinding` attribute of a `<serviceHealth>` element. If the attribute is not defined in a configuration file, its default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>. The property defines the value of the [ServiceHealthBehavior.HttpGetBinding](xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceHealthBehaviorBase.HttpGetBinding) property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the binding that is specified in the property.
Docs.value: The name of the binding that is specified in the property.

remarks.format: The binding name must be defined in the [\<bindings> section](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/bindings.md).
